word:
"It is a good thing to give thanks unto the Lord, and to sing praises unto Thy name, O Most High: to show forth Thy loving-kindness in the morning, and Thy faithfulness every night, upon an instrument of ten strings, and upon the psaltery; upon the harp with a solemn sound. For Thou, Lord, 
                                                                           13
hast made me glad through Thy work: I will triumph in the works of Thy hands." Psalm 92:1-4. 

                                               -
